item.description:
Thanks for all of your votes!! The winner of the dim sum poll is China Pearl in Chinatown.

review:

China Pearl in the Greater Boston area is a three star Chinese restaurant. This is one of the popular restaurants you'll find in the Chinatown area. When you step inside the restaurant, you'll notice a family atmosphere. This place features a full bar, brunch, and lunch. This place is handicap accessible, open late, and good for groups


For everyone who hasn't had Dim Sum before it is a lot of fun and definitely worth the experience!!

Please arrive on time and bring enough money. We will meet outside the restaurant at 10:30.

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Dim Sum in Chinatown
